series_description: This series consists of accounting records and reports supporting bond-related activity for entities that the Department of the Treasury serves as trustee. Includes CARS reports, REPO (Re-purchase agreement) investment reports, reconciliations, vouchers, and custody bank statements.
retention_statement: Retain 2 years after issue, then transfer to the Records Center, Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center for 7 years after the maturity date of the bond issue, then destroy.
